staxel.village.character.dialogue.RiahBe: I really love fishing, but these days it's more fun to chat with you, mya!
I don't know how that came about...
But it's a good thing, right mya?
Let's go on a fishing trip around the world someday, mya!
There are lots of really interesting places out there.
I'm sure there are fish that haven't even been discovered yet, mya!
Someday I'd like to introduce you to my siblings, mya.
It's funny, mya! The other day I was going to write you a letter and send it in a bottle...
But then I realised I could just talk to you directly instead mya!
